recipesJson.name: Root Beer Float
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a really easy, yet complete, root beer recipe with vanilla ice cream. FLV Root Beer is easily all you need, and the vanilla is just accent. I've messed around with FLV Root Beer a lot, and always just go back to something simple and at 5% the flavor pulls through on any kind of device. RDA, Subtank, Ego, w.e. Just a solid and simple recipe that is sure to impress anyone who likes root beer. 
MADE FOR VIDEO "EASY ROOT BEER E-LIQUID RECIPE"
->

reviews.text: Really good SNV, but a bit root beer forward for me. I'd like a little more of a creaminess to it but if you're a root beer fan you'll absolutely love it. FLV's Root Beer is a killer flavor, and this really accentuates it. Drop the super sweet if you're not a fan of sweeter flavors, but I'd recommend keeping the FW Vanilla Bean Ice Cream at a bare minimum. It makes the whole thing really pop and adds a creaminess to it that the root beer alone lacks in my opinion.
Taste good as SNV.  Didnt have vanillin, used Shisha Vanilla same %.  Good recipe.  Thanks again.
Wow can definitely see this being my adv for awhile gonna have to order some more flv root beer

Delicious shake n vape, love that Wayne doesn't overcomplicate the profile and really just lets the flv rootbeer shine. Every accent just enhances the natural flavor of the root beer and takes nothing away from it.
